actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, Energy Department, OMB.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to make available the Pick-Sloan Missouri basin program pumping power to the Hilltop and Gray Goose irrigation projects.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to make available the Pick-Sloan Missouri Basin program pumping power to the Hilltop irrigation projects and the Gray Goose irrigation projects, South Dakota.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to make available the Pick-Sloan Missouri basin program pumping power to the Hilltop and Gray Goose irrigation projects.
